title: League lagging for anyone else?
body: so 9/10 players in my game said they were lagging, is this a ddos attack from like poodlecorp or does this have something to do with something else.

replies.body: Are you still having this issue? If so, can you dive into some more detail on what issues you're seeing? I'll be happy to assist you further if you need help.
No it seemed to be gone this afternoon. :)
